segments.text: I notice the boy stretching for the cookie jar, balancing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s going to fall if he leans any further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her share, not even noticing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is about to collapse under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to all of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be watching them instead of drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making the floor slippery, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this anymore—someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies he doesn’t see how unstable he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
